name: podcast-explorer
description: This project is a continuation of my [Heimdall](https://github.com/TheRobBrennan/heimdall) project - which explores using the new alpha release of the [@neo4j/graphql](@neo4j/graphql) library within a [GRANDstack](https://grandstack.io) ([GraphQL](https://graphql.org), [React](https://reactjs.org), [Apollo](https://www.apollographql.com), [Neo4j Database](https://neo4j.com)) application
author: RobÂ Brennan <rob@therobbrennan.com> (therobbrennan.com)

scripts.docker:neo4j:cypher-shell: docker exec -ti podcast-explorer-neo4j cypher-shell -u neo4j -p letmein
scripts.docker:test:nextjs:ci: docker-compose exec nextjs npm run test:ci
scripts.docker:test:nextjs:coverage: docker-compose exec nextjs npm run test:coverage
scripts.docker:test:nextjs:verbose: docker-compose exec nextjs npm run test:verbose
scripts.docker:destroy:global: docker system prune -f --volumes && docker image prune -a -f
scripts.nuke: clear && npm run docker:destroy:global && npm run dev
